snippet.title: RKGK - Official Reveal Trailer | Triple-I Initiative Showcase
snippet.description: Here's your first look at RKGK in this reveal trailer for the upcoming anime-inspired single-player 3D platformer game coming to PC via Steam in summer 2024. In RKGK, the rebellious graffiti artist Valah is the only one who can fight back against the oppressive corporation that has taken over her city. Use stylish platforming action, chaotic mayhem, and vibrant self-expression to restore color and life to the citizens of Cap City. Turn heads, drop jaws, and be bright.
